name: mermaid-wizard
description: A modern, responsive web application for creating flowcharts using Mermaid.js

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-all
scripts.copy-all: npm run create-dirs && npm run copy-files
scripts.create-dirs: mkdir dist && mkdir dist\assets && mkdir dist\js && mkdir dist\lib
scripts.copy-files: copy index.html dist\ && copy .htaccess dist\ && copy favicon.ico dist\ && xcopy /E /I /Y assets dist\assets && xcopy /E /I /Y js dist\js && xcopy /E /I /Y lib dist\lib
